name: youji game demo
description:
• Demo can only run on Windows
  • This games is a multiplayer side-scrolling ARPG.
  • Game(official version) length will be within 8 hrs.
  • it's a Wuxia story based in the wartime of late Ming dynasty. (the movie "crouching tiger, hidden dragon" is a wuxia story)
  • Art style is uniquely Chinese watercolor, easily identifiable.
  • Combat gameplay is special (a bit like Apotheon), and fight tempo will be fast.
  • Though players will find themselves strongly immersed in Chinese culture, they do not have to understand to be enjoy the story and gameplay.

the video of demo:https://youtu.be/nOCfXxG0Mm4

Update: MSMW PC 160129

+The player can roll on the ground
